view.comment: Indicates that the returned API result is a paginated view, and tells you where to find the first, next, and previous pages of the view.

paginatedProperty.comment: Indicates which property of the API response -- such as 'edges' -- is being paginated.

firstPage.comment: A link to the first page of results.

nextPage.comment: A link to the next page of results. Only present if there is a next page.

previousPage.comment: A link to the previous page of results. Only present if there is a previous page.
